posts.post_content:
I recently picked up these three 1910 Tobacco Athlete Cards. They don't quite fit into my collection. They have some creases, but still some great eye appeal. I am asking $11 DLVD for all three.

[URL=http://s186.photobucket.com/user/metrotheme/media/IMG_zpsf9nro9sk.jpg.html][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x135/metrotheme/IMG_zpsf9nro9sk.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s186.photobucket.com/user/metrotheme/media/IMG_0001_zps3fel7wx0.jpg.html][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x135/metrotheme/IMG_0001_zps3fel7wx0.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
[URL=http://s186.photobucket.com/user/metrotheme/media/IMG_0004_zpsxxdyuuyl.jpg.html][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x135/metrotheme/IMG_0004_zpsxxdyuuyl.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s186.photobucket.com/user/metrotheme/media/IMG_0005_zpsdwsk8u4r.jpg.html][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x135/metrotheme/IMG_0005_zpsdwsk8u4r.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s186.photobucket.com/user/metrotheme/media/IMG_0002_zpspoilzzio.jpg.html][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x135/metrotheme/IMG_0002_zpspoilzzio.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s186.photobucket.com/user/metrotheme/media/IMG_zpsiy2pk49x.jpg.html][IMG]http://i186.photobucket.com/albums/x135/metrotheme/IMG_zpsiy2pk49x.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Price lowered. Looking to move all three as a lot.
I'll take them if you still have them
